content.title: UCC3 test party🎉
content.creator:
Bit Trade One
February 10, 2025
content.content:
Hello, backers!
Last week, we hosted a closed gathering where we unveiled the UCC3 and held a public test party! 🎉
Even among attendees who already owned the UCC2, many were impressed by the detailed information display of the UCC3.
Plus, the ability to test USB ports was a huge surprise that received lots of praise!
Everyone eagerly brought their own devices and cables to test, making for a fun and engaging event.
Our creator, Aloe-san, was also there and managed to spot a few minor bugs and areas for improvement.

We found some bad cables.
↓ ex) Cables connecter indicate "100W" but actually PD PowerCAP is 60W
（↑こちらはテスト会で発見されたダメなケーブルの例、コネクタに100Wと書いているのに実際には60Wが限界でした）


バッカーの皆さんこんにちは！ 

先週、クローズドな集まりながら、UCC3のお披露目とパブリックテストを兼ねたパーティを実施しました！ 
既にUCC2はみんな所持しているような参加者たちでも、UCC3の詳細な情報表示には感銘を受けてくれたご様子。
 更に、USBポートのチェックもできることには改めて驚きと称賛を頂きました。 
早速みんなが持ち寄ったデバイスやケーブルをチェックし、楽しい会となりました。 
製作者のあろえさんも参加し、いくつかの軽微なバグや改善点を見つけたとのこと。 

今後も同じような催しができればと考えています！

content.title: We added low-cost shipment reward!
content.creator:
Bit Trade One
February 6, 2025
content.content:
Hello backers,

Based on the feedback we have received, we have added a reward option with lower shipping costs. 
Please note that this will be part of our second shipment batch, so if you choose to switch from the Super Early Bird/Early Bird/DUO tiers, there will be a delay in delivery.
Also,it doesnt include tracking No. , and delivered later than EMS.
 We apologize that we were unable to offer this shipping option from the beginning and for any inconvenience this may cause. 
However, we hope you will reconsider your support in light of this new option!

content.title: THANK YOU FOR BACKERS!
content.creator:
Bit Trade One
February 5, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,

Thanks to all of your amazing support, we hit our funding goal in less than a day! 🎉
We’re super excited that UCC3 is officially happening and will be in your hands soon!
But this is just the beginning—the campaign is still going strong! We can’t wait to see how far this project will go (with piece of mind) , and we’re thrilled to keep developing and improving it together with you all.
If you have any thoughts, feedback, or questions, drop us a comment—we’d love to hear from you! 🚀
皆さんのサポートのおかげで、1日待たずしてファンディングゴールを達成することができました！ お手元にUCC3を届けられることが確定し、とても嬉しく思っています！ 
まだ期間は始まったばかり、どこまでプロジェクトが伸びてゆくのか皆さんと一緒に「安心して」見守ることができるのはとても楽しみですし、開発とアップデートを皆さんと一緒に行っていくことにもワクワクしています。 
何かご意見や質問などがあれば、是非コメントでお寄せ下さいね！
